intro: Sisymbrium nubigenum, commonly known as the clouded shepherd's purse, is a flowering plant native to the Mediterranean region. It belongs to the Brassicaceae family, which includes many other mustard family plants. The plant is characterized by its distinctive triangular seed pods and small, yellow flowers that bloom in early spring. It typically grows in rocky or dry soils and is often found in open habitats such as fields and slopes. Sisymbrium nubigenum is an annual plant that completes its life cycle within one growing season.
